value_claims.claim_title: 22% revenue increase through data-driven PMax optimization
value_claims.claim_description: Decathlon Austria achieved a 22% year-over-year revenue increase by utilizing data-driven automation to optimize Google Ads Performance Max campaigns and push products into the right campaigns aligned with business objectives.
value_claims.source_quote: Our collaboration culminated in a remarkable boost for Decathlon, marked by a 22% rise in revenue and an impressive 52% boost in ROAS (YoY)
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The revenue increase is explicitly attributed to 'data-driven automation' and algorithmic campaign optimization, which are AI-driven capabilities.

value_claims.claim_title: 52% ROAS improvement through automated campaign management
value_claims.claim_description: Decathlon Austria achieved a 52% year-over-year improvement in Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) through data-driven automation that optimized product placement and campaign structure in Google Ads Performance Max.
value_claims.source_quote: Our collaboration culminated in a remarkable boost for Decathlon, marked by a 22% rise in revenue and an impressive 52% boost in ROAS (YoY)
value_claims.attribution_evidence: ROAS improvement directly resulted from data-driven automation systems that optimized campaign configuration and product placement decisions.

value_claims.claim_title: Healthier revenue mix through strategic product prioritization
value_claims.claim_description: Data-driven automation enabled Decathlon to achieve a healthier revenue mix by guiding Google's spending towards strategically important products rather than only top sellers, creating a sustainable campaign structure.
value_claims.source_quote: By utilizing data-driven automation and pushing products into the right campaigns, Decathlon managed to achieve an overall healthier revenue mix and a sustainable, scalable campaign structure
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The healthier revenue mix is explicitly attributed to data-driven automation that intelligently allocates products to appropriate campaigns based on strategic value.

value_claims.claim_title: Team capacity freed from manual campaign management tasks
value_claims.claim_description: Automation freed Decathlon's in-house team from repetitive, error-prone manual campaign management tasks, allowing them to focus on strategic objectives like enhancing their own brand prominence.
value_claims.source_quote: Our partnership freed Decathlon's in-house team from repetitive, error-prone manual tasks, empowering them to concentrate on their core objective: enhancing the prominence of Decathlon's own brands.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automation directly eliminated manual tasks, explicitly freeing team capacity for higher-value strategic work.

context_claims.claim_title: Decathlon Austria GmbH - Ecommerce Leader Austria
context_claims.claim_description: Decathlon Austria is identified as an ecommerce leader in Austria, operating as a subsidiary (GmbH) of the larger Decathlon retail organization.
context_claims.source_quote: Ecommerce Leader Austria, Decathlon Austria GmbH

context_claims.claim_description: Decathlon operates in the retail sporting goods sector, selling sports equipment and apparel through ecommerce channels.
context_claims.inferred_from: Decathlon is a well-known sporting goods retailer, and the case describes ecommerce operations and product catalog management.

context_claims.claim_description: The AI application addresses Google Ads Performance Max campaign management, optimization, and budget allocation for digital advertising.
context_claims.source_quote: Decathlon faced significant challenges in effectively utilising Google Ads' Performance Max (PMax) campaigns.

context_claims.claim_description: Decathlon's strategic intent was to promote strategically important products and own brands rather than allowing algorithms to focus only on top sellers.
context_claims.source_quote: PMax was hijacking Decathlon's brand search traffic and primarily promoting top sellers, neglecting strategically important products

context_claims.claim_description: Decathlon Austria operated under resource constraints that made manual campaign management challenging and required automation to scale effectively.
context_claims.source_quote: managing these campaigns efficiently within their resource constraints proved challenging

context_claims.claim_description: Results are measured on a year-over-year basis, comparing performance metrics before and after the AI-driven optimization implementation.
context_claims.source_quote: marked by a 22% rise in revenue and an impressive 52% boost in ROAS (YoY)
